title: Refund against Cancelled booking : BookMyShow Support Centre
body:
We've got covered!
BookMyShow offers cancellation with many leading cinema across the country.
BookMyShow Cash
Refund is processed within 2 hours and the credits are valid for 2 years.
To the Original Source
We process the refund from our end, immediately hence it should reflect into your account within the next 5 to 7 working days.
To check BookMyShow Cash, you need click on "Account & setting which is available under your profile' then select 'Saved Payment Modes'.
In case the amount doesn't reflect under Saved payment mode, then do help us with the snapshot of BMS legder via LIVE CHAT for us to help you further.
PS- Incase the amount is paid using gift voucher the refund will be credited back in the same gift voucher. You may check your gift card balance
here
